text: The Philadelphia Story is a 1940 American romantic comedy movie directed by George Cukor and was based on the 1939 play of the same name by Philip Barry. It stars Cary Grant, Katharine Hepburn, James Stewart, Ruth Hussey, John Howard, Roland Young, Mary Nash, Virginia Weidler, Henry Daniell and was distributed by Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer. It was nominated for 6 Oscars and won 2 Academy Awards in 1941. It was remade as High Society in 1956. ==Other websites== * * * * Category:1940 romantic comedy movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:Movies based on plays Category:MGM movies Category:Movies directed by George Cukor
title: The Philadelphia Story
